skill.name: business-consistency
skill.description: Maintain NAP (Name, Address, Phone) consistency across all platforms. Use when managing citations, updating business info, or generating schema markup.
skill.summary: Maintain NAP (Name, Address, Phone) consistency across all platforms. Use when managing citations, u...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and guidance for maintaining business NAP consistency. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or system access detected. All 32 static findings are false positives caused by the scanner misinterpreting JSON-LD schema examples as code and platform listings as reconnaissance patterns.

content.value_statement: Inconsistent business information across directories damages local SEO rankings and confuses customers. This skill ensures your NAP data stays perfectly synchronized across Google Business Profile, Apple Maps, Facebook, and 30+ directories with automated audits and schema markup generation.
actual_capabilities: Audit NAP consistency across all platform tiers
Track citation status from not claimed to verified
Identify and recommend fixes for inconsistencies
Create structured data for AI search engines
limitations: Does not directly update external platforms - generates recommendations only
Requires existing business_consistency_master table for full functionality
Limited to platforms documented in skill definition
Audit reports are generated in JSON format only

use_cases.title: Multi-Platform NAP Audit
use_cases.description: Run monthly consistency checks across Google, Bing, Apple Maps, and 50+ directories with scoring.

use_cases.title: Citation Management
use_cases.description: Track claim status and verify business information stays consistent after address or phone changes.

use_cases.title: Schema Markup Generator
use_cases.description: Automatically generate valid Schema.org JSON-LD markup from centralized business data.

prompt_templates.title: Quick NAP Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check NAP consistency for our business. Compare our master record against Google Business Profile, Bing Places, and Facebook.

prompt_templates.title: Schema Generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate LocalBusiness schema markup from our business_consistency_master record for our website footer.

prompt_templates.title: Monthly Audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a complete NAP audit across Tier 1-3 platforms. Report overall score, tier breakdowns, and specific issues found.

prompt_templates.title: Update Rollout
prompt_templates.prompt: Our business is changing address next week. Generate an update plan for all Tier 1-2 platforms and create new schema markup.

output_examples.input: Audit our NAP consistency across all platforms
output: Tier 1 Score: 100% (Google, Bing, Apple Maps, Facebook all match)
Tier 2 Score: 87% (Yellow Pages and True Local need updates)
Recommendations: Update phone format on Yellow Pages, fix suburb name on True Local

output_examples.input: Generate schema markup for our business
output: Contains geo coordinates and sameAs social links
Ready to embed in website header or footer

best_practices: Use business_consistency_master as single source of truth for all NAP data
Run weekly spot checks on 1-2 Tier 1 platforms to catch issues early
Update schema markup immediately after any business information change
anti_patterns: Manually editing individual platform listings without updating the master record
Assuming Tier 1 platforms stay in sync automatically
Using different business names across platforms without documented reason

faq.question: Which platforms are supported?
faq.answer: Tier 1 includes Google Business Profile, Bing Places, Apple Maps, Facebook. Tier 2 adds Yellow Pages AU, True Local, Hotfrog. Tier 3 covers LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube.

faq.question: What is the frequency limit for audits?
faq.answer: Weekly spot checks on Tier 1 platforms recommended. Full monthly audits across all tiers for complete coverage.

faq.question: How does this integrate with my website?
faq.answer: Skill generates JSON-LD Schema.org markup from business_consistency_master table. Copy directly into website header or footer.

faq.question: Is my business data safe?
faq.answer: This is a prompt skill with no data storage. All data handling occurs through your existing Supabase database with RLS policies.

faq.question: Why does NAP consistency matter?
faq.answer: Search engines verify business legitimacy across multiple sources. Inconsistent NAP data lowers local rankings and confuses customers.

faq.question: How is this different from other citation tools?
faq.answer: Focuses on Australia-specific identifiers (ABN, ACN, QBCC) and includes GEO optimization for AI search engines like Perplexity and ChatGPT.
